column4: I have removed grub from my system ( PXE booting) used the purge command but still dose a dist-upgrade install it
grub is going to be installed as part of the ubuntu-desktop metapackage i'm sure - thus it'll always want to be installed when you do updates/upgrades
I guess the same with server installation, but I don't want grub as it can't be confed when you PXE boot
it's in SOME metapackage for sure ;)
